description: AdFind continues to be seen across majority of breaches. It is used to domain trust discovery to plan out subsequent steps in the attack chain.
name: AdFind Usage Detection
query: process.command_line:(*domainlist* OR *trustdmp* OR *dcmodes* OR *adinfo* OR *\ dclist\ * OR *computer_pwdnotreqd* OR *objectcategory\=* OR *\-subnets\ \-f* OR *name\=\"Domain\ Admins\"* OR *\-sc\ u\:* OR *domainncs* OR *dompol* OR *\ oudmp\ * OR *subnetdmp* OR *gpodmp* OR *fspdmp* OR *users_noexpire* OR *computers_active*)
author: Janantha Marasinghe (https://github.com/blueteam0ps)
